description.zh-cn: 清朝初年宗室、皇父摄政王、权臣、军事家、政治家，努尔哈赤第十四子，为清朝入关后的奠基者之一。
description.en: A prince, regent, and de facto ruler of the early Qing dynasty. He was the 14th son of Nurhaci and a key figure in the Qing conquest of China.

description.zh-cn: 后金开国君主，清朝的奠基者，多尔衮之父。
description.en: The founding khan of the Later Jin dynasty and the founder of the Qing dynasty; father of Dorgon.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤大妃，乌拉那拉氏，多尔衮的生母，为努尔哈赤殉葬。
description.en: Nurhaci's primary consort from the Ula Nara clan, mother of Dorgon. She was forced to commit suicide to accompany Nurhaci in death.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第二位皇帝，努尔哈赤第八子，多尔衮的异母兄。
description.en: The second emperor of the Qing dynasty, the eighth son of Nurhaci, and Dorgon's half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 清朝入关后的第一位皇帝，皇太极第九子，多尔衮的侄子。
description.en: The first emperor of the Qing dynasty to rule over China, the ninth son of Hong Taiji, and Dorgon's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极长子，曾与多尔衮争夺皇位，后遭多尔衮迫害。
description.en: The eldest son of Hong Taiji, who contended with Dorgon for the throne and was later persecuted by him.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，与多尔衮同为顺治帝的辅政王。
description.en: A Manchu noble who served as co-regent for the Shunzhi Emperor alongside Dorgon.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极之妃，顺治帝生母。野史传说其曾下嫁多尔衮。
description.en: A consort of Hong Taiji and the mother of the Shunzhi Emperor. Unofficial histories allege that she married Dorgon after Hong Taiji's death.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，于乾隆四十三年下令为多尔衮平反并恢复其睿亲王封号。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, who posthumously rehabilitated Dorgon and restored his princely title in the 43rd year of his reign (1778).

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮的同母兄。
description.en: Dorgon's full brother.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮的同母弟。
description.en: Dorgon's full brother.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮唯一的亲生女儿。
description.en: Dorgon's only biological child, a daughter.

description.zh-cn: 豫亲王多铎第五子，过继给多尔衮为嗣子。
description.en: The fifth son of Prince Yu (Dodo), who was adopted by Dorgon as his heir.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮的嫡福晋，出身蒙古科尔沁部。
description.en: Dorgon's primary consort, from the Khorchin Borjigit clan.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜王朝宗室女，后嫁与多尔衮为福晋。
description.en: A lady of the Joseon royal clan who was married to Dorgon as one of his consorts.

description.zh-cn: 明朝总兵，在与多尔衮率领的清军作战中阵亡。
description.en: A Ming dynasty general who was killed in battle against Qing forces led by Dorgon.

description.zh-cn: 明末将领，在松锦之战中被俘投降清朝。
description.en: A late Ming general who was captured in the Battle of Songjin and subsequently surrendered to the Qing.

description.zh-cn: 明末将领，在松锦之战中举锦州城投降。
description.en: A late Ming general who surrendered the city of Jinzhou during the Battle of Songjin.

description.zh-cn: 李氏朝鲜第十六代君主，在丙子战争中向清朝投降。
description.en: The sixteenth king of the Joseon dynasty, who surrendered to the Qing during the Qing invasion of Joseon.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个帝制王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 后金的第一个都城，多尔衮的出生地。
description.en: The first capital of the Later Jin dynasty and the birthplace of Dorgon.

description.zh-cn: 位于今河北承德市滦平县，多尔衮在此去世。
description.en: Located in present-day Luanping County, Chengde, Hebei, where Dorgon passed away.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初年为辅佐年幼皇帝而设立的职位，由多尔衮担任。
description.en: A position created in the early Qing dynasty to assist a young emperor, held by Dorgon.

description.zh-cn: 清朝和硕亲王爵位，首任为多尔衮。
description.en: A peerage title of the first rank in the Qing dynasty, first held by Dorgon.

description.zh-cn: 指1644年清朝军队进入山海关，占领北京，并逐步统一中国的过程。多尔衮是这一过程的主要决策者和领导者。
description.en: The process starting in 1644 where the Qing army entered Shanhai Pass, occupied Beijing, and gradually unified China. Dorgon was the primary decision-maker and leader of this process.

description.zh-cn: 1636年皇太极第二次讨伐朝鲜的战争，多尔衮是重要的指挥官之一。
description.en: The second Qing invasion of Korea in 1636, led by Hong Taiji, in which Dorgon was a key commander.

description.zh-cn: 明清之间的一场决定性战役，清军在多尔衮等人的指挥下获胜，为之后入关奠定了基础。
description.en: A decisive battle between the Ming and Qing dynasties. The Qing victory, with Dorgon as one of the commanders, paved the way for the subsequent conquest of China.

en: Great Qing Code with Commentaries and Sub-statutes

description.zh-cn: 清朝第一部成文法典，由多尔衮下令以明律为蓝本修订。
description.en: The first written code of law of the Qing dynasty, revised based on the Ming Code under Dorgon's order.

en: Six Major Policies of the Early Qing

description.zh-cn: 指清朝初年被后世诟病的六项政策，包括薙发、易服、圈地、占房、投充、逋逃，通常认为与多尔衮的统治直接相关。
description.en: Refers to six controversial policies of the early Qing dynasty: the queue order, change of dress, land enclosure, property seizure, forced servitude, and fugitive slave laws, which are generally associated with Dorgon's regency.

description.zh-cn: 顺治七年十二月，多尔衮在边外狩猎时坠马，膝盖受伤，随后不治身亡。
description.en: In December 1650, Dorgon fell from his horse while hunting, injured his knee, and subsequently died from the injury.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮是努尔哈赤的第十四子。
description.en: Dorgon was the fourteenth son of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮是努尔哈赤大妃阿巴亥的儿子。
description.en: Dorgon was the son of Nurhaci's primary consort, Abahai.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮是皇太极的异母弟。
description.en: Dorgon was the younger half-brother of Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮是阿济格的同母弟。
description.en: Dorgon was the younger full brother of Ajige.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮是多铎的同母兄。
description.en: Dorgon was the older full brother of Dodo.

description.zh-cn: 东莪是多尔衮唯一的亲生子女。
description.en: Dong'e was the only biological child of Dorgon.

description.zh-cn: 多尔博是多铎之子，过继给多尔衮为嗣子。
description.en: Dorbo was the son of Dodo, adopted by Dorgon as his heir.

description.zh-cn: 根据《清朝野史大观》等非正史记载，孝庄文皇后在皇太极死后下嫁多尔衮，但此事在史学界仍存争议。
description.en: According to unofficial histories like the 'Grand View of Qing Dynasty Unofficial Histories', Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang married Dorgon after Hong Taiji's death, but this remains a debated topic among historians.

description.zh-cn: 敬孝义皇后是多尔衮的嫡福晋。
description.en: Empress Jingxiaoyi was Dorgon's primary consort.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极继位被认为是取代了努尔哈赤原意传位的多尔衮，多尔衮摄政时也宣称皇太极“即位原系夺立”，二人存在皇位继承上的矛盾。
description.en: Hong Taiji's succession was seen as supplanting Dorgon, who was allegedly Nurhaci's intended heir. Dorgon himself later claimed that Hong Taiji's enthronement was a usurpation, indicating a conflict over the succession.

description.zh-cn: 在皇太极死后的皇位争夺中，多尔衮阻止了豪格继位，并在之后迫害豪格致死。
description.en: In the struggle for the throne after Hong Taiji's death, Dorgon prevented Hooge from succeeding and later persecuted him to death.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮是顺治帝的叔父和摄政王，在顺治朝初期掌握实际最高权力。
description.en: Dorgon was the uncle and Prince Regent for the Shunzhi Emperor, holding the de facto supreme power during the early years of the Shunzhi reign.

description.zh-cn: 在与豪格的皇位争夺中，多尔衮最终选择扶持年幼的福临（顺治帝）继位。
description.en: In the power struggle with Hooge, Dorgon ultimately chose to support the young Fulin (the Shunzhi Emperor) to ascend the throne.

description.zh-cn: 与济尔哈朗共同辅政，辅佐年幼的顺治帝。
description.en: Served as co-regent with Jirgalang, assisting the young Shunzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 作为摄政王，多尔衮是清军入关、入主中原的最高决策者和领导者，对奠定清朝统治起了关键作用。
description.en: As Prince Regent, Dorgon was the supreme decision-maker and leader of the Qing forces' entry into and conquest of central China, playing a critical role in establishing Qing rule.

description.zh-cn: 在丙子战争中，多尔衮奉皇太极之命追击朝鲜王室，迫使朝鲜投降。
description.en: During the Qing invasion of Joseon, Dorgon, under Hong Taiji's orders, pursued the Joseon royal family, forcing their surrender.

description.zh-cn: 作为清军指挥官，率部追击并接受了朝鲜仁祖的投降。
description.en: As a Qing commander, he led the pursuit and accepted the surrender of King Injo of Joseon.

description.zh-cn: 在崇德三年的南征中，多尔衮率领的左翼军击杀了明朝总兵卢象升。
description.en: During the southern expedition in 1638, the left-wing army led by Dorgon defeated and killed the Ming general Lu Xiansheng.

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮是松锦之战中清军的初期主要指挥官之一。
description.en: Dorgon was one of the initial primary commanders of the Qing forces in the Battle of Songjin.

description.zh-cn: 明军在松锦之战中惨败，总督洪承畴被俘投降。
description.en: The Ming army was decisively defeated in the Battle of Songjin, leading to the capture and surrender of its commander, Hong Chengchou.

description.zh-cn: 松锦之战后，总兵祖大寿举锦州城投降。
description.en: After the Battle of Songjin, General Zu Dashou surrendered the city of Jinzhou.

description.zh-cn: 谕令法司官会同廷臣详绎明律，为《大清律集解附例》的编修打下基础。
description.en: He ordered judicial officials and courtiers to study the Ming Code in detail, laying the groundwork for the compilation of the Great Qing Code.

description.zh-cn: 作为清初实际最高统治者，推行了剃发易服、圈地、投充、逃人法等一系列政策，后世合称为“清初六大弊政”。
description.en: As the de facto ruler of the early Qing, he implemented a series of policies including the queue order, land enclosure, forced servitude, and fugitive slave laws, later collectively known as the 'Six Major Detrimental Policies of the Early Qing'.

description.zh-cn: 在多尔衮死后两个月，顺治帝宣布其罪状，剥夺其所有封号，并下令掘墓毁尸。
description.en: Two months after Dorgon's death, the Shunzhi Emperor stripped him of all his titles, announced his crimes, and ordered his tomb to be exhumed and his corpse mutilated.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆四十三年，乾隆帝下诏为多尔衮平反，恢复其睿亲王封号，并追谥为“忠”。
description.en: In 1778, the Qianlong Emperor officially rehabilitated Dorgon, restoring his title of Prince Rui and granting him the posthumous name 'Zhong' (Loyal).

description.zh-cn: 此次坠马受伤事件直接导致了多尔衮的死亡。
description.en: This horse riding accident directly led to Dorgon's death.
